parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the loop to use to create the patch

title: IShutOffSurfaceFeatureData.FlipFaceTangentTo
description: Indicates to create the patch on the opposite tangent face.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the loop to use to create the patch

remarks:
This method is only available when the type of patch is set to swPatchTypeTangent. See
IShutOffSurfaceFeatureData::LoopPatchType
and
IShutOffSurfaceFeatureData::SetAllPatchTypes
.
